name: frontend-moderno-projeto-1
description: Curso Frontend Moderno: Gulp, SASS, NPM-script, Git e Git-bash Daniel Tapias Morales

scripts.postinstall: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist src/components/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css src/components/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/components/font-awesome/

author: Ricardo Do Vale
